Change Log
===========

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/).

## [2.0.0] 2018-10-26

### Added

- uSilex support
- Docker support

### Changed

- No more supporto to php 5.4
- PHP unit update


## 1.0.0 2016-10-20

First release.
